sentences.sentence: I felt guilty and full of remorse.
sentences.translation: 我感到内疚，并且非常懊悔。

sentences.sentence: He seemed to feel no remorse at all.
sentences.translation: 他当时似乎一点也不感到懊悔。

sentences.sentence: He was full of remorse and asked Beatrice what he could do to make amends.
sentences.translation: 他悔恨不已，问比阿特丽斯他可以做点什么来弥补。
